item.title: AGI Safety Fundamentals Course 2022 project
item.description: In the 2022 AGI Safety Fundamentals course I worked on toy investigations on deceptively aligned agents in a toy environment. You can find relevant code, results and ideas for future work / extensions in this gitlab repository.

item.title: AI Safety Camp 2022 project
item.description: In AI Safety Camp 2022 I worked on learning and penalizing betrayal in agent communications in an RL setting. A workshop paper describing research work and empirical outcomes can be found here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Machine Learning scientist, currently working in different ML Research and Engineering roles in multiple domains, including Argument Mining, Multimodal Neurodegenerative Disease Prediction, AI Safety and Alignment.
